Field.name: PrimaryPublicationAuthorityCode
Field.comment: Code indicating type of external reference

Field.name: TariffAgencyCode
Field.comment: Code defining the tariff bureau or tariff publishing agent that governs the rates applied to this shipment

Field.name: TariffNumber
Field.comment: Standard tariff number for the tariff which governs the rates applied to the commodity item(s)

Field.name: TariffNumberSuffix
Field.comment: Suffix to a tariff identifying number

Field.name: TariffSupplementIdentifier
Field.comment: Identifier for the tariff supplement which contains the rate used

Field.name: TariffSection
Field.comment: Number used as an extension of the basic tariff number to identify the rates published within specific sections of the tariff

Field.name: TariffItemNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned in the tariff to specific rate or group of rates that applies to one or more items in the shipment

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: DocketControlNumber
Field.comment: A grouping identification which, when combined with elements 140 and 690, provides a unique identity to a parcel of ratemaking activity

Field.name: DocketIdentification
Field.comment: A sequence number which, when combined with elements 140 and 697, provides a unique identity to a parcel of ratemaking activity

Field.name: RevisionNumber
Field.comment: A number which indicates the chronological sequence of revisions and updates to a ratemaking docket

Field.name: GroupTitle
Field.comment: The descriptive title of a data group

SyntaxNote.name: P0809
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PRI08 or PRI09 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P101112
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PRI10, PRI11 or PRI12 are present, then the others are required.
